metadata.subject: Louis XV, King of France, 1710-1774
Fontenoy, Battle of, Fontenoy, Hainaut, Belgium, 1745
Austrian Succession, War of, 1740-1748
metadata.title: Seconde piece des habitans de Fontenoy au roy
metadata.creator: Louis XV, King of France, 1710-1774, addressee
metadata.note: Bound in a volume with manuscript title page: Campagne du roi, en mil sept cent quarente cinq, & premieres armes du dauphin; with engraving pasted on title page.
metadata.publisher: A Fontenoy : Chez la Veuve de Gand, rue de Bruges, vis-à-vis le marché de Tournay, au-dessus de la fontaine d'Alost, à la Ville d'Oudenarde
metadata.description: Title vignette (royal arms of France); head-pieces
No. 31 of 49 titles bound together; pages trimmed and mounted in larger paper (25 cm)
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on the cover page. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
